word: The angels who lingered upon Olivet after Christ\92s ascension repeated to the disciples the promise of His return: \93This same Jesus, which is taken up from you into heaven, shall so come in like manner as ye have seen him go into heaven.\94 Acts 1:11. And the apostle Paul, speaking by the Spirit of Inspiration, testified: \93The Lord himself shall descend from heaven with a shout, with the voice of the archangel, and with the trump of God.\94 1 Thessalonians 4:16. Says the prophet of Patmos: \93Behold, he cometh with clouds; and every eye shall see him.\94 Revelation 1:7.
